summary: This mod adds a standalone follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]

This Description is saying about 1.4[/size]

[size=6]
Summary
[/size]
Standalone follower
Winking Skeever in Solitude
Young Eager Voice like Ysolda
She uses mainly magics but also can handle one-handed, light armor etc..
Marriageable



[size=5]Options on the installer[/size]

UNP or CBBE
2k or 4k
Elf ears or not
Default 70 weight or max
Blonde or Black



[size=5]An issue when you update her[/size]
[spoiler]
New combat settings won't be applied to her unless you reset her esp with the following way

[1]
Retrieve her items which you gave and dismiss her
[2]
Skip time until she disappears from the cell where you're now
[3]
Create the new save and close skyrim
[4]
Uninstall the old version and launch skyrim
[5]
Load the save you created above and create the new save again
[6]
Install the new version and load the latest save
[7]
Done

This seems like a hassle but is the very general way to reset the follower mods

[color=#f1c232]However[/color] you shouldn't do it if you've already been married with her
[color=#f1c232]OR[/color] after getting a divorce from her with a mod, try the way above..
[/spoiler]



[size=6]Recommended Mods[/size]

One of the Follower overhaul mods such as AFT
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288 <= [color=#f1c232]this. seriously.[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by cloudedtruth <= She hardly smiles without this.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot




[size=6]Q & A[/size]

Q : She makes FPS drop as heck
A : It's probably a conflict between her skeleton and your skeleton

[1]
meshes\actors\character\character assets female\skeleton female.nif <= COPY THIS

*You need to install one of the Skeleton mods such as XPMSE if there is no skeleton female.nif there.

[2]
and paste(overwrite) it to meshes\actors\character\chaconne\ HERE

Unfortunately this way makes her body proportion different from what I intend but fps is more important.


Q : I lost her..
A : Try [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051]this.[/url] 

Q : Her face is different from those screenshots..
A : For the enb users. Try tweaking Subsurface Scattering settings.
     For the non enb users. Try [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73473]Quick Light[/url]﻿ or something like that.


Q : Want to change her body
Q : Want to change her Skeleton
A : Data\meshes\actors\character\Chaconne\ HERE


Q : She has the neck gap
A :
[1]
Open console and click her
[2]
Type "setnpcweight xx"
[color=#ffd966]xx has to be the same weight as when you chose on the installer (70 or 100)[/color]
[3]
Her face will disappear but ignore it
(if not, you failed to click her so try again until her face disappears)
[4]
Type "disable" and "enable"
[5]
Done.




The old change logs that people no longer see
[size=3][spoiler]
[/size]v[color=#f6b26b]1.3[/color] => v[color=#f6b26b]1.3.1[/color]
Tweak face a little bit.
v[color=#f9cb9c]1.2.1[/color] => v[color=#f9cb9c]1.3[/color]
Tweak textures and face model.
Add 4k body texture
v1.2. => v1.2.1 (v1.1 => v1.1.1)
Added mipmaps to her textures to improve the performance. (Sorry for it, just my mistake...)
But this is a small thing, so please update if your PC is low specs or her face becomes black often.
v1.1 => v1.2
Change her appearance.
Add some body types (UNP, UNPB, UNPB-BBP, CBBE, SeveNBase).
Add weight 100 option.
Delete spells of Frost cloak and Ice storm.
Change her mood to "natural" from "happy" (it means she isn't always smile)
v1.0 => v1.1
Change her appearance.
Added some body types (UNP, UNPB, UNPB-BBP, CBBE).
Became Fomod file.
[/spoiler]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/262628/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/Q2ryH7z.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

Improved her appearance

Added the black hair type
Changed her Race to the additional one from Nord to make her skeleton standalone
